dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then Ackerman turns... a big smile on his face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh but I did get my man, Ms. Jones.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She realizes; he was after Demidov all along.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ackerman nods to Goyal, a twinkle in his eye.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mr. Goyal, you may place Mr. Quinn under arrest now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quinn is taken completely off guard. Before he can move, Goyal and another agent have placed him in handcuffs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Quinn)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What? You thought I didn't know? You were unwittingly quite helpful; without you Mr. Demidov might have escaped justice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He turns to Jones with a smile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: After all, Demidov wasn't a target of this investigation, was he?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ackerman walks over to the window as Quinn is led away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ACKERMAN'S POV - Cara and Frank walk toward the canal in the street below.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A WATER TAXI approaches.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's something I don't understand... how did Pearce manage to get here and open that safe without anybody noticing? And where did he go?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ackerman stands at the window with his hands behind his back. For the briefest of moments, Frank looks back up at him and their eyes connect.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Frank gives him a little smile.   Cara takes his arm to climb onto the boat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLOSE ON ACKERMAN:   his eyes narrow.   He knows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For a moment he doesn't move. Then, in spite of himself, a small smile creeps over his face too.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because Pearce was cleverer than all of us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cara and Frank step on board.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The DRIVER starts the engine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He turns to REVEAL... that he is the "ENGLISHMAN" we've seen throughout the movie. He and Frank look at one another for a moment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: $20 million dollars worth of surgery and that's the face you chose?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (English accent)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's good to see you too.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They embrace warmly. Cara is in disbelief, realizing just how completely Frank/Alexander has planned things out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She casts one last glance backwards.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You really think they'll just give up?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Americans have their money.   I left it all for them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about Demidov's money?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well... (smiles)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have to save something for your pension.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Englishman opens the door to the cabin for them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A bottle of Crystal Champagne and two glasses are set out for them. Frank leads Cara in and offers her a glass.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Instead, she slips into his arms and presses against him. They begin to kiss...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CAMERA STAYS discreetly behind as they pull away from us, the water taxi swinging out into the Grand Canal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As it recedes from view, the vaporetto's tail lamps shimmer and blend into the beautiful lights of Venice... city for lovers.
